title: Marathons Can Be Deadly — But Not For the Reasons You May Think
description: In this pilot episode of a new “Freakonomics of Medicine” podcast, when host Dr. Bapu Jena misses his wife’s 5K run, he sets out to study how road closures and detours on big race days affect people with medical emergencies.
author: bapu@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
